alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:57PM AKST until December 08 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting to 35 mph near Whitter. * WHERE...Western Prince William Sound. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of light snow will develop by late this afternoon. Snow may become heavy, falling at the rate of inch per hour, before becoming lighter in intensity through the evening. The combination of snowfall rates, gusty winds, and the dry nature of the snow resuspended by vehicular travel may significantly reduce visibility along area roadways. The strongest wind gusts are expected near Whittier.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
